title: Select connection node for Actived/Current connection Tab.
author: savaladaojr
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
When the user clicked on a connection node (connections) that is already connected, the nRemoteNG could show up the connection Tab. I mean, could activate the "Tab" related to that connection.

And also, the opposite should be expected behavior. For example:  when the user clicks (not double-click) on the connection TAB, the ap...
